text: A Wicked Woman is a 1934 American drama movie directed by Charles Brabin and was based on the novel of the same name by Anne Austin. It stars Mady Christians, Charles Bickford, Betty Furness, Zelda Sears, Robert Taylor, Sterling Holloway and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1934 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Brabin
title: A Wicked Woman
